abstract: The man who introduced America to Pokémon is now hoping to find new success with a line of collectible cards aimed at girls.
snippet: The man who introduced America to Pokémon is now hoping to find new success with a line of collectible cards aimed at girls.
lead_paragraph: He has already introduced America to a boy-oriented trading card game (Magic: The Gathering) and one with unisex appeal (Pokémon). Now, Peter D. Adkison is hoping to find new success with a line of collectible cards aimed at girls.

headline.main: With Ponies, Unicorns and Secret Codes, an Effort to Unleash a Craze for Girls
headline.print_headline: With Ponies, Unicorns and Secret Codes, an Effort to Unleash a Craze for Girls
